definition: pleural cavity (part of thorax containing lungs)

sentences.english: To explore the significance of adenosine deaminase in patients with tuberculous pleurisy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腺苷脱氨酶在结核性胸膜炎中的临床意义。

sentences.english: The acute pleurisy model was established by injecting carrageenan.
sentences.chinese: 注射角叉菜胶以建立急性胸膜炎模型。

sentences.english: Microscopically, the fibrous pleural plaque is composed of dense layers of collagen.
sentences.chinese: 镜下纤维性胸膜斑由数层致密的胶原纤维组成。

sentences.english: A chest tube can be placed to re-expand the lung.
sentences.chinese: 闭式引流管可排出胸膜腔内的气体使萎缩肺膨胀。

sentences.english: Subpleural honeycomb cysts typically occur in several contiguous layers.
sentences.chinese: 胸膜下蜂窝囊泡可见于数个相邻层面。

sentences.english: Pleural disease may also take the form of a pleural "effusion".
sentences.chinese: 胸膜疾病也可能采取其他形式的胸腔“积液”。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the role of nutritional support in the treatment of tuberculous pleurisy .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨营养支持在结核性胸膜炎治疗中的价值。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the clinical traits of tuberculo pleurisy and discuss the therapy schedule.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结结核性胸膜炎的临床特点，并探讨治疗方案。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of intrapleural urokinase in the treatment of pleural thickening and loculated pleural effusion.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察胸腔内注射尿激酶治疗结核性胸膜炎的效果。

sentences.english: "V" type knot device and pleurodesis are safe in VATS.
sentences.chinese: 型打结器及胸膜固定术在胸腔镜手术中安全可靠。

sentences.english: Subpleural nodules are visible peripherally and in relation to the major fissures.
sentences.chinese: 可见肺外带胸膜下结节，与肺裂相关。
咳嗽，呼吸困难，胸膜炎，发烧。

sentences.english: The fluids secreted by each pleura enable the lungs to move easily when breathing.
sentences.chinese: 胸膜分泌的液体使得肺可以在呼吸时流畅运动。

sentences.english: Intrapleural pressure is usually negative pressure.
sentences.chinese: 胸膜腔内压通常为负压。

sentences.english: No cavitation, lymphadenopathy, or pleural effusion was demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 经过证明没有空洞，淋巴结大和胸膜渗出。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience of the prevention and treatment on bronchopleural fistula (BF) complicated after pneumonectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结肺切除术后并发支气管胸膜瘘的诊治经验。

definition: mediastinum (organs and tissues in the thorax between the lungs)
serosa/serous membrane (smooth moist delicate membranes lining body cavities)
